text: ยง 11-704.2 Special credit. A tenant whose base rent for the tax year beginning June first, nineteen hundred ninety-three and ending May thirty-first, nineteen hundred ninety-four is at least eleven thousand dollars per year but not in excess of thirteen thousand nine hundred ninety-nine dollars per year shall be allowed a credit against the tax imposed by this chapter for such tax year, such credit shall be equal to twenty-five percent of the tax imposed on such base rent for such tax year. Where the base rent of a tenant is for a period of less than one year, such base rent shall, for purposes of this section, be determined as if it had been on an equivalent basis for the entire year. The credit allowed under this section shall be deducted prior to the deduction of any credit allowable under section 11-704.1 of this chapter.
